page.title: 17My Life in Birchwood
page.content: I am eleven years old.I have lived in Birchwood for nearly seven months.My house is next to Birchwood C.E. school.I used to live in Barlestone.My old house was enormous and had 24 rooms.My home here is the vicarage and has 8 rooms.I have two sisters and one brother. I am the eldest.My hobbies are swimming and collecting things about the Royal Family.I like living here.My mum shops at Presto and Fine Fare.My dad goes to the university every Wednesday.I go to Guides,piano lessons and recorder club.I have a dog called Peter and a gerbil called Harry.In September I am going to Birchwood High School.The school is new and will only have first and second years so there won't be many children.
